level.text: The Office shall submit an annual report covering the preceding fiscal year to the Mayor by January 1st.
A copy of the annual report shall be sent to each member of the Council and placed in each branch of the public library.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-19
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-19, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 2-1701.
